query.commandtext: SELECT WM.MAT_ID, MD.MAT_DESC , SUM(PD.PLAN_QTY) AS PLAN_QTY, SUM(WM.S1_MOVE_LOT + WM.S2_MOVE_LOT + WM.S3_MOVE_LOT + WM.S4_MOVE_LOT) AS OUT_LOT, SUM(WM.S1_MOVE_QTY_1 + WM.S2_MOVE_QTY_1 + WM.S3_MOVE_QTY_1 + WM.S4_MOVE_QTY_1) AS OUT_QTY_1 FROM RSUMWIPMOV WM, MWIPMATDEF MD, MWIPPLNDEF PD ??
SELECT OS.ORDER_ID, OS.MAT_ID, MD.MAT_DESC, OS.ORD_QTY, OS.ORD_IN_QTY, OS.ORD_OUT_QTY FROM MWIPORDSTS OS, MWIPMATDEF MD ??
